txt.en: Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has vowed to rescue Sara Oakheart, held captive by goblins within Rath Teraig, putting worries of his father's fate out of his mind.
Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has encountered the goblins guarding Sara Oakheart, and joins them in battle.
'Our fight is not yet at its end!'
'Be on your guard! Our enemies continue their attack!'

'Skorgrím has escaped, [placeholder], but I think Ered Luin will be safe from him now... at least for a time. For that, I feel the combined assault of dwarves and Elves was a success.
 
'It will be a long while before we know the full cost of our actions here. Many good people have fallen in Rath Teraig this day.

'I will tend to my father's wounds, and then together we can report to Langlas and tell him what has happened here today.'
'This has been an amusing exercise, but now it is over. Ered Luin is weak, and that is enough.'
'I have business now in Bree-land. War is coming, and soon all of Middle-earth shall burn.'
'I am ready, [placeholder]. We will find Skorgrím Dourhand and drive the fell creature not only from Rath Teraig, but from Ered Luin itself!'
'I feel rested enough to continue. Let us continue our search for Skorgrím Dourhand.'

'I am ready to move on, [placeholder]. We must find and rescue this Sara Oakheart. Once she is safe, we can continue our search for Skorgrím.\n\n'Perhaps we will find my father up ahead and can lend him our aid, though I am sure he has little need of our blades.'
'My wounds are too great! I must rest awhile.'
'They are preparing a fresh attack. Be ready.'
'You are most welcome. You should leave this place at once!'
'It is safe to come out now, ma'am. You have nothing to fear.'
'Goblins, on the cliff above us! Hurry, follow me!'
'I am sure we will, my friend.'
'The goblins are regrouping! Hold them off, and I will call out their positions!'

Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has come nearly to the final encampment of goblins within Rath Teraig, and hopes to encounter his father Cardavor.
Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has found his father, but Cardavor has been wounded -- used as the bait in a trap set by Skorgrím!
Skorgrím Dourhand has escaped. Avorthal is waiting to speak with you regarding the course you should take next.
'Avorthal! I was starting to think you were leaving all the goblins to me!'
'My wounds are too great... I will be of little help to you now.'
'There she is! Quickly, we must save her!'
'Now [placeholder], let us find Skorgrím and finish this!'
'Take care, Avorthal! We will have many tales to tell when this is over!'
'The day is not won yet, though. There are more goblins ahead.'
'I think you are right. Let us rest a while.'
'My father is strong. Do not fear for him.'
'Your axe may yet see service... once I run out of arrows!'
'Get rid of those goblin-spearmen or we'll be done for!'
'Mathi Stouthand is in trouble! We need your aid!'
'Not at all, my friend! But look to your blade, for we have guests!'
'Do not worry about me, my son. I fear for the lands to the south.'
'Your father led some Elves and dwarves to rescue Sara Oakheart. He never returned.'
'Thank you, dear. I felt sure I would meet my end at the hands of those awful goblins!'
'Lead the way, Master Dwarf, and we will follow!'
'Looks like you could use some help, Athal!'
'You are defeated, Skorgrím! The dwarves and the Elves stand against you!'
'Thank you, dear. The goblins would have been the end of me, I'm sure!'
'I can find my way home from here, Master Dwarf. Take care of yourself!'
The Dwarves and Elves of Ered Luin have begun their assault on the goblin-army in the cleft of Rath Teraig, and Langlas sent you behind enemy lines to meet Avorthal.
'Let us rest for a moment before we proceed.'
'Avorthal! The goblins have captured a woman.'
'I will see that we can hold the gate!'

Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has pledged the strength of his arm to your cause and seeks revenge upon Skorgrím for the harm he has caused the peoples of Ered Luin.

Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nA surprise attack by goblins has thinned the ranks of the Free Peoples in Rath Teraig, and now Avorthal leads a counterattack on the goblins lurking on the heights above.

Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has vowed to rescue Sara Oakheart, held captive by goblins within Rath Teraig, putting worries of his father's fate out of his mind.
Skorgrím Dourhand has escaped. Avorthal is waiting to speak with you regarding the course you should take next.
Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nAvorthal has learned that Mathi Stouthand is in trouble, and urges you onward to the dwarf's defence.
Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nMathi Stouthand and his allies are trapped by the encircling rocks as goblins attack from all sides.
'You should rest a moment, though, before pressing ahead.'

Avorthal seeks Skorgrím Dourhand inside the goblin-infested vale of Rath Teraig.\n\nA surprise attack by goblins has thinned the ranks of the Free Peoples in Rath Teraig, and now Avorthal leads a counterattack on the goblins lurking on the heights above.
